name: Garden Blast Flower 2
description: Garden Blast Flower 2 is new and exciting game from top hit game. It is an addictive match 3 and match 4 game! Blast the blossom flower buds after line them up and enjoy the very addictive splash and most interesting match-three casual puzzle game! It is also a brand new amazing popping simulator game, completely free, you can play till you drop!! Blast your way through beautiful gardens full of sweet buds! Link the buds to bloom and clear the flowerbeds before you run out of moves!
